feed.title: Brig Lamoreaux |
feed.subtitle: Long term storage for a forgetful mind

entry.title: Mentor teaches how to argue
entry.content:
Notes from Mark Castrovinci 1:1

  • Focus on an Organization approach to instill greatness…
    • be clear on expectations
    • help get to the next level
    • Consider How other companies do this
  • Influence needs homework
    • Not about me… how can we make this better… with Concrete ideas
    • Make it their idea.
  • Don’t Criticize or people will become defensive and dig it
    • Make it their idea.
  • Manage your manager with Confidence
    • Get your arguments together.
    • Consider how I would do this on my own…. Without my boss in the picture. If I need to present to someone Higher.
  • Technical Expert
    • Need influence
  • Manager
    • Influence with great people
    • Orchestrate

entry.title: Tack and Diplomacy
entry.content:
Notes from Mark Lipshaw

  • Tack and Diplomacy
    • Org measures you by outcomes
    • Create trust up and down
  • Involve
    • … how can I help
    • … what ever is needed
    • … forge ahead
  • Data sells
    • must speak to them
    • road shows

entry.title: Recent Accomplishments
entry.content:
I was asked to put together a list of accomplishments I’ve achieved over the past few months. I thought it would be important to focus on different aspects of my career growth.

Tactical Achievements

  • Learner Profile: Captured ambiguous project requirements to formalize a design and implementation strategy
  • Principle contributor to corporate semantic standards and best practices for technology use.
  • Leading Self Service team to research and implement key Self service features using my POC/Research methodology.

Internal Collaboration

  • Collaborated with teams across the organization to unify around semantic data strategy (See ecosystem drawing).
  • Reached out to Directors and VP for mentorship

Industry Leader

  • Wrote a White Paper and presented the results at several conferences on how Apollo evaluated MongoDB.
  • Wrote several articles explaining ontologies and cloud testing best practices.
  • My paper was featured on CIO website.
  • Collaborate with UK Junior College to help guide students in thesis research projects

Keeping Current

  • Completed MBA program (3 May 2013)
  • Attended Standford Probabilistic Graphical Models course offered through Coursera.
entry.summary: I was asked to put together a list of accomplishments I’ve achieved over the past few months. I thought it would be important to focus on different aspects of my career growth.

entry.title: Networking is Important
entry.content:
These are the notes form a one on one with Mark Castrovinci.

  • Networking is very important
  • Get out there. Pick up the phone. Let people know you have it under control
  • Be confident.

Consider the books

  • The 12 bad habits that hold good people back
  • 21 Dirty Tricks at Work (To be aware of what could be going on around you)
  • Setup two week followup.
entry.summary: These are the notes form a one on one with Mark Castrovinci.
